mapper.insert: insert into smbms_bill ( billCode,productName,productDesc, productUnit,productCount,totalPrice, isPayment,providerId,createdBy,creationDate) values( #{billCode},#{productName},#{productDesc}, #{productUnit},#{productCount},#{totalPrice}, #{isPayment},#{providerId},#{createdBy},#{creationDate} )
mapper.select: select b.*,p.proName providerName from smbms_bill b,smbms_provider p where b.id=#{id} and b.providerId = p.id
select count(*) from smbms_bill where providerId = #{providerId}
